name: Hop Ball Run: Jump on Tiles 3D
name_original: Hop Ball Run: Jump on Tiles 3D
description:
Welcome to Hop Run Ball: Jump on Tiles 3D!

The best music based jumping game that challenges your reflexes and reaction time. All you have to do is simply jump the magic ball on color tiles. Listen to the magic beat, follow the rhythm and use your musical reflexes to guide the ball from tiles to tiles.

HOW TO PLAY
1. Touch, hold and drag to jump the ball on tiles.
2. Don't fall off the tiles

Get the game right now for FREE and start jumping the tiles to become the master of tile jumping. Have fun, relax and enjoy!
